text: Jürgen Trumpf (8 July 1931 – 13 May 2023) was a German politician. He was the Secretary-General for the Council of the European Union from 1 September 1994 to 17 October 1999. He was also the first High Representative for Common Foreign and Security Policy for a few months in 1999. Trumpf died on 13 May 2023 in Bonn, Germany at the age of 91. == References == Category:1931 births Category:2023 deaths Category:High Representatives of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy Category:Politicians from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:People from Düsseldorf
title: Jürgen Trumpf
